snippet: Alexis Sanchez scored a second-half goal as Barcelona and Lionel Messi struggled past crosstown rival Espanyol, 1-0, to remain atop the Spanish league.
abstract: Barcelona beats rival Espanyol, 1-0, in Spanish League soccer; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Alexis Sanchez scored a second-half goal as Barcelona and Lionel Messi struggled past crosstown rival Espanyol, 1-0, to remain atop the Spanish league.
